item.title: House releases new Epstein investigation documents, Alex Acosta interview
item.description: The documents include schedules of meetings with powerful figures, call logs, and Acosta speaking about Epstein’s plea deal.

item.title: Trump orders disgraced former congressman George Santos released from prison
item.description: Santos had been sentenced to more than seven years in prison after pleading guilty to federal charges of aggravated identity theft and wire fraud

item.title: Maine Senate candidate downplayed sexual assault concerns in deleted posts
item.description: Democrat Graham Platner disavowed the comments in an interview with The Washington Post, saying, “I don’t want people to judge me off the dumbest thin...

item.title: U.S. military detains survivors of latest boat strike near Venezuela
item.description: The operation is the sixth known attack on alleged drug smugglers in the Caribbean, and the first known to have left some people alive.

item.title: New York GOP suspends Young Republicans chapter after racist chat messages
item.description: The move leaves the door open for the return at an undetermined time of a political organization aimed at party members ages 18 to 40.
